document.full_text: a roadside bomb targeted a united nations convoy near a southern lebanese port friday, wounding several italian peacekeepers and a lebanese passerby, officials said.
document.title: bombing attack on peacekeepers in lebanon adds another jolt to a region in upheaval
lines_and_colors: a roadside bomb targeted a united nations convoy near a southern lebanese port friday, wounding several italian peacekeepers and a lebanese passerby, officials said.
